title: Net income of Marriott International worldwide 2007 to 2018
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Net income in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2016 to 2011.
Additionally, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2016.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2011 to 2009.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: Global hotel giant Marriot International accounted for a net income of approximately 1.27 billion U.S. dollars in 2019 , down from the previous year 's total of 1.91 billion U.S. dollars . A global player in the hotel industry With nearly seven thousand hotels around the world , Marriot International was one of the largest hotel chains worldwide in 2019 . It also ranked ahead of other large hotel chains such as Hilton Worldwide , Hyatt Hotel , and Host Hotels & Resorts in terms of revenue in 2018 .
